moc.title: CRANKSAHFT SPHEROIDAL GRAPHITE IRON
moc.data: Spheroidal Graphite Iron: Cranksha is made of nitrated, hardened and tempered Spheroidal Graphite Iron casTing

moc.title: MAIN BODY (CRANK CASE) : GREY CAST IRON
moc.data: Main body in gray Iron casTing FG-260. with honned surface finished bore.

moc.title: PISTON (CROSS HEAD) : ALLOY STEEL
moc.data: Alloy steel construction for hard surface coating and super finish.

moc.title: CONNECTING  ROD : ALLOY STEEL
moc.data: Forged steel connecting rods with anfriction bearings. Heavy pin area, construction for load strength.

moc.title: BEARING:
moc.data: Oversized for maximum life and load distributon. self alignment roller bearing enables it to handles 26% more load than other pumps.

moc.title: PUMP HEAD : STAINLESS STEEL
moc.data: Liquid end is made of high corrision ressistant forged SS 304

moc.title: COMPLETE VALVE : STAINLESS STEEL
moc.data: Vavles made of stainless steel are hardened and anti corrision hard surface caoted for long life. High volumetric efficiency valve operate at 96% efficiency plus.

moc.title: PLUNGER: CERAMIC / TUNGSTEN COATED
moc.data: Primarily composed of ceramic coated or Tungsten coated. Surface roughness is extremely good i.e. <0.2 Ra.

moc.title: PLUNGER SEAL : PTFE ARAMIDE
moc.data: “V” style strong and tightend under load or aramide fibre yarn packing for high compressive and tensile strength ensure effective sealing

techDetails: Inlet Pressure Min. / max: 2 to 3 bar
Max. Liquid Temp.: 70 DEG. C (160 DEG. F)
Available Direct Couple 1000 RPM for 50 Hz (Not 60 Hz) or 1450 RPM For Pulley - belts drives or Gear Box
notes: Maximum permissible fluid temperature is 70 Deg.C

Power calculations shown in the table are based on maximum related pressure; however, for low pressure requirements, power will also be proportionally reduced. Pump speed lower than the specified chart is also available for special applications.
Volumetric efficiency is considered @100% when not specified.
